amendment.description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit NNSA from halting construction on the HE Synthesis, Formulation, and Production facility at the Pantex Plant.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson (TX) amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson (TX) amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson (TX) amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
